(nation park) gener sherman tree, largest tree world. locat tular county, california, unit state nearest&#160;c visalia, california coordin 36°33′53″n 118°46′24″w﻿ / ﻿36.56471°n 118.77337°w﻿ / 36.56471; -118.77337coordinates: 36°33′53″n 118°46′24″w﻿ / ﻿36.56471°n 118.77337°w﻿ / 36.56471; -118.77337 area 404,064 acr (631.350&#160;sq&#160;mi; 163,519&#160;ha; 1,635.19&#160;km2)[1] establish septemb 25, 1890 visitor 1,106,584 (in&#160;2012)[2] governing&#160;bodi nation park servic websit http://www.nps.gov/seki/index.htm sequoia nation park nation park southern sierra nevada east visalia, california, unit states. establish septemb 25, 1890. park span 404,064 acr (631.35&#160;sq&#160;mi; 163,518.90&#160;ha; 1,635.19&#160;km2).[1] encompass vertic relief nearli 13,000 feet (4,000&#160;m), park contain among natur resourc highest point contigu 48 unit states, mount whitney, 14,505 feet (4,421&#160;m) sea level. park south contigu king canyon nation park; two administ nation park servic togeth sequoia king canyon nation parks. park famou giant sequoia trees, includ gener sherman tree, one largest tree earth. gener sherman tree grow giant forest, contain five ten largest tree world. giant forest connect gener highway king canyon nation park' gener grant grove, home gener grant tree among giant sequoias. park' giant sequoia forest part 202,430 acr (81,921&#160;ha) old-growth forest share sequoia king canyon nation parks.[3] indeed, park preserv landscap still resembl southern sierra nevada euro-american settlement.[4] content 1 front countri 2 back countri 3 human histori 4 geolog 5 park attract 6 see also 7 refer 8 extern link front country[edit] mani park visitor enter sequoia nation park southern entranc near town three river ash mountain 1,700&#160;ft (520&#160;m) elevation. lower elev around ash mountain contain nation park service-protect california foothil ecosystem, consist blue oak woodlands, foothil chaparral, grasslands, yucca plants, steep, mild river valleys. foothil region also home abund wildlife: bobcats, foxes, ground squirrels, rattlesnakes, mule deer commonli seen area, rarely, reclus mountain lion pacif fisher seen well. last california grizzli kill park 1922 (at hors corral meadow).[5] california black oak key transit speci chaparr higher elev conif forest.[6] higher elev front country, 5,500 9,000 feet (1,700 2,700&#160;m) elevation, landscap becom montan forest-domin conifer belt. found ponderosa, jeffrey, sugar, lodgepol pine trees, well abund white red fir. found mighti giant sequoia trees, massiv live single-stem tree earth. trees, spring summer snowmelt sometim fan form lush, though delicate, meadows. region, visitor often see mule deer, dougla squirrels, american black bears, sometim break unattend car eat food left careless visitors. plan reintroduc bighorn sheep park.[7] back country[edit] high sierra trail hamilton lake pass great western divid vast major park roadless wilderness; road cross sierra nevada within park' boundaries. 84 percent sequoia king canyon nation park design wilderness[8] access foot horseback. sequoia' backcountri offer vast expans high-alpin wonders. cover highest-elev region high sierra, backcountri includ mount whitney eastern border park, access giant forest via high sierra trail. traveler' path along 35-mile (56&#160;km) backcountri trail, one pass 10 mile (16&#160;km) montan forest reach backcountri resort bearpaw meadow, short great western divide. continu along high sierra trail great western divid via kaweah gap, one pass kaweah river drainage, characterist v-shape river valleys, kern river drainage, ancient fault line aid glacier last ice age creat u-shap canyon almost perfectli straight nearli 20 mile (32&#160;km). floor canyon, least two day hike nearest road, kern canyon hot spring, popular rest point weari backpackers. floor kern canyon, trail ascend 8,000&#160;ft (2,400&#160;m) summit mount whitney. mount whitney, high sierra trail meet john muir trail pacif crest trail, continu northward along sierra crest backcountri king canyon nation park. human history[edit] area compris sequoia nation park first home monache (or western mono) nativ americans, resid mainli kaweah river drainag foothil region park, though evid season habit exist even high giant forest. summertime, nativ american would travel high mountain pass trade tribe east. day, pictograph found sever site within park, notabl hospit rock potwisha, well bedrock mortar use process acorns, stapl food monache people. tharp' log, cabin form hollowed-out giant sequoia log time first european settler arriv area, smallpox alreadi spread region, decim nativ american populations. first european settler homestead area hale tharp, famous built home hollowed-out fallen giant sequoia log giant forest next log meadow. tharp allow cattl graze meadow, time respect grandeur forest led earli battl log area. time time, tharp receiv visit john muir, would stay tharp' log cabin. tharp' log still visit today origin locat giant forest. however, tharp' attempt conserv giant sequoia first met limit success. 1880s, white settler seek creat utopian societi found kaweah colony, sought econom success trade sequoia timber. however, sequoia trees, unlik coast redwood relatives, later discov splinter easili therefor ill-suit timber harvesting, though thousand tree fell log oper final ceased. nation park servic incorpor giant forest sequoia nation park 1890, year founding, promptli ceas log oper giant forest. park expand sever time decad present size; one recent expans occur 1978, grassroot efforts, spearhead sierra club, fought attempt walt disney corpor purchas high-alpin former mine site south park use ski resort. site annex park becom miner king, highest-elev develop site within park popular destin backpackers. geology[edit] sequoia nation park contain signific portion sierra nevada. includ park' mountain landscap tallest mountain contigu unit states, mt. whitney, rise 14,505 feet (4,421&#160;m) sea level.[9] great western divid parallel sierran crest. mountain great western divid greet visitor miner king seen moro rock giant forest area. peak great western divid climb 12,000 feet (3,700&#160;m). mountain lie deep canyons, includ tokopah valley lodgepole, deep canyon marbl fork kaweah river deep park' backcountry, kern canyon, 5,000 feet (1,500&#160;m) deep 30 mile (48&#160;km).[10] great western divid seen summit mount kaweah mountain canyon sierra nevada form granit rocks. rocks, granite, diorit monzonite, form molten rock cool far beneath surfac earth. molten rock by-product geolog process known subduction. power forc earth forc landmass water pacif ocean beneath advanc north american continent. super-hot water driven subject ocean floor migrat upward melt rock went. process took place cretac period, 100 million year ago. granit rock speckl salt pepper appear contain variou miner includ quartz, feldspar micas. valhalla angel wing promin cliff rise headwat middl fork kaweah river.[10] geologist debat details, clear sierra nevada young mountain range, probabl 10 million year old. forc earth, probabl associ develop great basin, forc mountain grow climb toward sky. last 10 million years, least four period glacial advanc coat mountain thick mantl ice. glacier form develop long period cool wet weather. glacier move mountain like slow-mot river carv deep valley craggi peaks. extens histori glaciat within rang eros resist natur granit rock make sierra nevada togeth creat landscap hang valleys, waterfalls, craggi peaks, alpin lake glacial canyons.[10] calcit format crystal cave park caves, like cave sierra nevada california, mostli solut cave dissolv marble. marbl rock essenti limeston metamorphos heat pressur format uplift sierra nevada batholith. batholith' rapid uplift past 10 million year led rapid eros metamorph rock higher elevations, expos granit beneath; therefore, sierra nevada cave found middl lower elev (below 7,000&#160;ft 2,100&#160;m), though cave found park elev high 10,000&#160;ft (3,000&#160;m) white chief cave cirqu cave miner king. cave carv rock abund season stream park; larger park cave current sink stream run them. park home 240 known caves, potenti hundr more. cave park includ california' longest cave 20 mile (32&#160;km), lilburn cave, well recent discov cave remain strictli off-limit hand specialist visit rare occas studi cave geolog biology. commerci cave open park visitor remain crystal cave, park' second-longest 3.4 mile (5.5&#160;km) remark well-preserv volum visit receiv annually. discov april 28, 1918 alex medley cassiu webster.[11] cave constant 48&#160;°f (9&#160;°c), access guid tour. cave discov everi year park; fact, 17 discov sinc 2003 alone. recent discov major cave park, septemb 2006, name ursa minor.[12] park cave valu scientist caver alik pristin beauty, variety, endem cave life. park attractions[edit] tunnel tree 1940 crescent meadow giant forest, call john muir "gem sierra" view moro rock potwisha, near hospit rock addit hiking, camping, fishing, backpacking, follow attract highlight mani park visitors: sherman tree trail 0.8-mile roundtrip pave trail descend park lot base gener sherman tree meander grove giant sequoia trees. tunnel log tunnel cut fallen giant sequoia tree sequoia nation park. tree, measur 275 feet (84&#160;m) tall 21 feet (6.4&#160;m) diameter, fell across park road 1937 due natur causes. follow year, crew cut 8-foot (2.4&#160;m) tall, 17-foot (5.2&#160;m) wide tunnel trunk, make road passabl again. tokopah fall trail tokopah fall start beyond marbl fork bridg lodgepol campground. easi 1.7 mile (one way) walk along marbl fork kaweah river impress granit cliff waterfal tokopah canyon. tokopah fall 1,200 feet (365.8 meters) high, impress earli summer. crescent meadow small, sequoia-rim meadow giant forest region sequoia nation park. sierran montan meadow mark western terminu high sierra trail, stretch meadow across great western divid mount whitney. pioneer hale tharp homestead nearbi log meadow. conservationist john muir visit meadow mani time prais highli call "gem sierras". meadow lie end three-mil pave road leav gener highway near giant forest museum. moro rock granit dome locat center park, head moro creek, giant forest crescent meadow. 400-step stairway, built 1930 civilian conserv corps, cut pour onto rock, visitor hike top. stairway list nation regist histor places. view rock encompass much park, includ great western divide. elev 6,725 feet (2,050&#160;m). campground park includ three foothil area: potwisha (42 sites), buckey flat (28 sites), south fork (10 sites). four campground higher, conifer-domin elevations, rang 6,650 7,500 feet (2,000 2,300&#160;m): atwel mill (21 sites), cold spring (40 sites), lodgepol (214 sites), dorst creek (204 sites). giant forest museum offer inform giant sequoia human histori forest. histor museum built 1928 architect gilbert stanley underwood. see also[edit] african-american heritag site (u.s. nation park service) buffalo soldier ecolog sierra nevada fauna
